summary: Steve is a character from the popular video game Minecraft. He's one of nine characters players can choose to represent them in the game. Steve doesn't have a specific backstory because players are meant to create their own adventures with him. His fame grew along with Minecraft's success, and he's now seen as the game's mascot. Steve has appeared in ads, on merchandise, and even in other games like Super Smash Bros. Ultimate. He'll also be played by Jack Black in an upcoming Minecraft movie.
title: Steve (Minecraft)
